content: CPF Asked by AnonymousAsked on 01 May 2019CPF SA hack. Is this legit? Https://smartinvesting18.blogspot.com/2019/04/cpf-special-account-hack-are-you-ready.htmlI don't understand why you need to buy and sell to keep your monies in SA.I thought the excess of FRS will stay in SA and still earn 4% too?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Loh Tat Tian, 2nd Hand Insurance Broker / EX-FA at Singapore Insurance Value FindingLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 03 May 2019Assuming you have OA $131,000 and SA $181,000Scenario 1:You allowed SA to be fully used to cover RAYou only have RA ($171,000) at 4% interest (not counted since both are the same)SA ($10,000 at 4% interest is $400OA($131,000 at 2.5% interest is $3,275Total interest is $3,675.00Scenario 2:You used the CPF SA hackYou allowed OA to be fully used to cover RAYou have RA ($171.000) at 4% (not counted since both are the same)SA ($141,000) at 4% interest is $5,640.00Total interest is $5,640.00Which is better in your opinion?0 comments0
